name: WPB Related Products Slider for WooCommerce – Show WooCommerce Related Products in Slider
author: wpbean

sections.description:
WPB Related Products Slider for WooCommerce plugin will replace the default WooCommerce related products with a nice and smooth slider of all related products. The slider is fully dynamic, just active and it’s ready to show the slider of related products in single product page. No extra settings required.

The design of WPB Related Products Slider for WooCommerce is very nice and standard, it will match with all kinds of WooCommerce store. It’s fully responsive so nothing to worry about the small devices.

It has settings to manage the style settings & some basic setups.

Get The PRO Version | DEMO | Support

Plugin Features

  • Two different theme for related products slider.
  • Autometic related products output depending upon the product category and tags.
  • All devices supported responsive slider.
  • Flat type nice design.
  • Very light weight.
  • Work with all standard WordPress theme.
  • Easy to use.
  • Developer friendly clean code & easy to customize.

PRO Version Features

  • Select product specific custom relative products.
  • Show relative products slider form products tag match only.
  • Upsells and Cross-sells Products Slider.
  • Remove Out of Stock Products from the Slider.
  • Relative products order & order by settings.
  • Adding the related products slider to the product tab.
  • Enable or disable slider pagination, navigation, auto play & slider speed.
  • Option for choosing the number of columns in slider for small screen devices.
  • Style settings for changing colors of navigation, pagination, text, button and price.
  • Life time free update.
  • Free and quick support.
  • Free installation service ( if needed ).

You may also like our some other WooCommerce plugins

WPB Woocommerce Product slider | Woocommerce Image Zoom | WooCommerce LightBox | WooCommerce Custom Tab Manager
sections.installation:
• Install it as a regular WordPress plugin

  • Active the plugin.

  • This plugin’s Related Products Slider will replace the default WooCommerce Related Products.

  • Go to this plugin’s setting panel for basic customize.

Available action hooks

  • do_action( ‘wpb_wrps_before_title’, $product )
  • do_action( ‘wpb_wrps_after_title’, $product )
  • do_action( ‘wpb_wrps_after_price’, $product )
  • do_action( ‘wpb_wrps_after_cart’, $product )

sections.reviews:
Good plugin and Good support

By Tarjeet Singh (tarjeet98) on November 26, 2022

Good plugin and Good support, It fullfills all of my requirements and devs are very helpful. Thank you very much!

Fantastic Plugin, But Pro Is Way Too Expensive

By scuffed on February 21, 2022

I love this plugin, it makes the Relatable Products area work beautifully, I haven't found another plugin that even comes close. But the problem is, the premium is just too expensive. Maybe if you only plan to use this plugin on one site, it may not be too bad. But for the very simple function the plugin serves of making a feature that is already included in Woocommerce, look and work nicer, $280 for an unlimited license is rather astronomical, with all due respect to the creator, and how much work it takes to code these things. I would love to purchase this plugin to support the creator, and get the plugin to work to its fullest, but for that to happen the price would have to come down dramatically for the pro version.

Support for the pro version is excellent

By markasmith89 on May 27, 2021

I had a couple issues when activating this plugin: 1) There was a hook missing on my site which kept the slider from appearing on my product page (I had this issue with other related product slider plugins I tried) 2) When I added a longer custom title, it overlapped with the navigation arrows I posted tickets with the pro plugin's support team, and they created custom code for me to add that resolved both issues. Took them a day or so to respond, but I highly recommend their work! Definitely worth purchasing the pro version just for the support.

Plug'n'play

By bonanzagroove on February 5, 2021

This is a fantastic plugin. It just works. (That is, the basic free version).

Amazing instant support by chat

By slselwyn on August 4, 2020

Had a problem getting WPB WooCommerce Related Products Slider PRO to work. Imran logged into our site and discovered that our theme was causing the problem and updated the plugin to make it work, all in 1 hour. Brilliant support.

Great support and great plugin!

By kitaj01 on June 1, 2020

Absolutely love it! Author even helped with some CSS issues! Keep up the amazing work! I will be purchasing Pro just to support you guys :)

Lack of Support

By stevenp123 on March 27, 2019

I purchased the product slider pro for the additional features. The plugin works on my site and looks good, however i have received no support when trying to determine the best way to use the woocommerce CSV import suite with the plugin. I first contacted support on March 15 there was some back and forth, but now it has been 7 days without a response and i have followed up on multiple occasions. I have now asked for a refund two different ways, but still crickets! It is very disappointing when you pay for a plugin and receive no support.

Does'nt seem to work with Woocmmerce 2.6.14

By ayanastudios on June 4, 2018

Would be helpful if it works with woo-commerce 2.6.14. If we install now it is not loading the related products itself instead it shrinks and stops displaying the footer part half way in product pages.

great support

By (guest111) on September 3, 2016

I needed a little help with some custom code and got it very quickly. Love the plugin and support!

Usefull and 100% working plugin

By Bhanu1413 on September 3, 2016

This plugin will show a slider of related product on single product page's bottom so it's look nice and i am happy for it
